scripts.build-curl1: curl https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Material+Symbols+Outlined:wght@100..700 --output styles\_material-symbols-outlined.scss --user-agent "Mozilla/5.0,(Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/117.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"
scripts.build-curl2: curl https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Material+Symbols+Rounded:wght@100..700 --output styles\_material-symbols-rounded.scss --user-agent "Mozilla/5.0,(Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/117.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"
scripts.build-curl3: curl https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Material+Symbols+Sharp:wght@100..700 --output styles\_material-symbols-sharp.scss --user-agent "Mozilla/5.0,(Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/117.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"
